# pinnacle_sqlalchemy

pinnacle sqlalchemy is a metadata plugin for pinnacle that allows you to store metadata in a SQL database.

This plugin cannot be used independently; it must be used together with pinnacle_ibis.


## Installation

```bash
pip install pinnacle_sqlalchemy
```

## API


- [Code](https://github.com/pinnacle-io/pinnacle/tree/main/plugins/sqlalchemy)
- [API-docs](/docs/api/plugins/pinnacle_sqlalchemy)

| Class | Description |
|---|---|
| `pinnacle_sqlalchemy.metadata.SQLAlchemyMetadata` | Abstraction for storing meta-data separately from primary data. |
